0011000001110001 0001100110101000 0 -> sum: 0100101000011001, cout: 0
0010001001000100 1001101001110101 0 -> sum: 1011110010111001, cout: 0
1110010110000000 0101110000100100 0 -> sum: 0100000110100100, cout: 1
